Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier bridge lift  near the Chicago River, downtown. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier bridge lift  near the Chicago River, downtown. 

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
